fehd.ADR_EN: G/F & 1/F, NO 59, 61 & 61A, TONG MI ROAD, TAI KOK TSUI, KOWLOON
fehd.ADR_TC: 九龍大角咀塘尾道59，61及61A號地下及1樓

geocode_en.formatted_address: 61 Tong Mi Rd, Tai Kok Tsui, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: 61 Tong Mi Rd, Tai Kok Tsui, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 61 Tong Mi Rd, Tai Kok Tsui, Hong Kong
result.name: Cheng Du Old Pier Hot Pot

reviews.text: This hotpot was famous in China. Its environment, service and foods were really great! Chinese designed spacious area, friendly service and fresh delicious foods. The hotpot soup was very special! Highly recommended for the chicken one!

This restaurant is politically biased!

A bunch of peaceful protesters finished their walk on 16/6/2019 (the two million people protest against extradition bill), barely have they started their meal and the manager asked them to pay up and leave immediately because they are wearing black shirts (symbol of the protest walk) and the manager said their bosses are all pro-China and does not welcome them!

Very good food and very helpful and friendly staff. A little warning though, we ordered a 1 peper spicy soup but it was so spicy it was barely eatable and I do like spicy food. The tomato soup was very delicious though.

It ain't cheap here but definitely worth it!

Not that good. The food here tasted way below average, and you could find much better hot pot places nearby. Plus, the staff here isn't very accommodating and I found the customer service less than satisfactory.

Spicy Ma La soup started light and sugar- sweet, eventually becoming strong and hot spicy, but still, it doesn't taste salty at all. Food portion comes with half and full, portions are generous. Staff are polite, menu is priced though. It doesn't value what it charged! Better try somewhere else! A/C is extremely strong, so make sure you are wrapped well!

result.vicinity: 61 Tong Mi Road, Tai Kok Tsui

result.adr_address: 香港大角咀塘尾道61號
result.name: 成都老碼頭火鍋

reviews.text: This hotpot was famous in China. Its environment, service and foods were really great! Chinese designed spacious area, friendly service and fresh delicious foods. The hotpot soup was very special! Highly recommended for the chicken one!
1)紅油湯底不麻；2)食材不地道；3)醬料不四川；4)價格不值。

嗜辣之士@古色古香的正宗成都風味火鍋

每次黎旺角多數都係打邊爐，上網見到呢間「成都老碼頭」既食物同裝修都好古色古香就決定黎食!
上網一查，火鍋店早在內地紮根多年，在國內已有百多間分店。

從門面上已感受到那古色古香的氣派，店足有2層，面積大，座位寬敞。

嗜辣之士不容錯過！湯底分了好幾種，我地選擇成都小辣同椰子湯鴛鴦湯底。  
湯底辣得過癮，配上瘋狂辣牛肉，風味十足!醬油、水果、圍裙等，全都以自助形式供應，店員更貼心地為我們調製特色老碼頭醬汁。店員獨門秘調- 麻香又帶點點辣, 好香好惹味, 個人覺得好好味!~

老友鬼鬼: 即係油炸鬼加墨魚滑，呢個記住唔駛淥太耐，大概一分鐘內，同埋記住要墨魚滑向底呀!

蛋餃:好大陣蛋香味🥚入面包左豬肉餡

鵝腸爽脆新鮮必試，，唔係一味肥，好特別好好食，加上佢用個架逐條整齊掛上，有一種霸氣嘅感覺。

爽脆牛黃喉 推介，牛黃喉放湯後，脆卜卜，十分爽脆，而它本身味道不重，吃時點上店員調製的秘製醬汁，很美味。

高原雪花繡球菌: 1週年價10蚊加配，呢個菌我之前未見過未食過，幾特別又大塊爽脆，好清甜!

老碼頭筷子牛肉: 牛肉被切成條狀🔪，加上以大量的醃料醃製🌱，入口微辣，口感爽嫩。

This restaurant is politically biased!

A bunch of peaceful protesters finished their walk on 16/6/2019 (the two million people protest against extradition bill), barely have they started their meal and the manager asked them to pay up and leave immediately because they are wearing black shirts (symbol of the protest walk) and the manager said their bosses are all pro-China and does not welcome them!

Very good food and very helpful and friendly staff. A little warning though, we ordered a 1 peper spicy soup but it was so spicy it was barely eatable and I do like spicy food. The tomato soup was very delicious though.

It ain't cheap here but definitely worth it!
